attributes.action: tax large companies like tesco etc for creating congestion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: more and more small towns are being hit with large unsightly supermarkets. this is creating havoc on congestion, these are the one's who are creating congestion and is this not bad on the enviroment having cars constantly burning fuel having to stop and start at the ever increasing sets of lights. if small towns are going to be effected then supermarkets should put towards the congestion tax as they are the one's creating it.
